welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zhenjiang, a city known for its beautiful scenery, rich history, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC (肯德基)
restaurants.description: KFC (肯德基) is a fast food restaurant located in 镇江.
restaurants.address: Zhongshan W Rd, 镇江, 江苏

restaurants.description: Pizza Hut (必胜客) is a pizzeria located in 镇江.
